name: Peekaboo I Duck You
description:
Hide behind objects before wardrobe opens. Get close and shoot ghosts with duck(Space/A). Collect stars. Shooting ghosts revives objects over time.

Made it with @nastasia_taran for Ludum Dare 37: One Room. Ludum Dare entry page

It's unfinished. You can't loose / win. Will update post LD.

Controls:

  • WSAD/L-stick - move
  • Space/A - shoot duck when close to wardrobe

Sound copyrights goes to:

  • https://www.freesound.org/people/zagi2/sounds/1844...
  • https://www.freesound.org/people/Kyster/sounds/156...
  • https://www.freesound.org/people/propthis/sounds/2...
